016package com.exoreaction.xorcery.handlebars.providers;
017
018import com.exoreaction.xorcery.jsonapi.Attributes;
019import com.exoreaction.xorcery.jsonapi.ResourceObject;
020import jakarta.inject.Inject;
021import jakarta.inject.Singleton;
022import jakarta.ws.rs.Consumes;
023import jakarta.ws.rs.Encoded;
024import jakarta.ws.rs.Produces;
025import jakarta.ws.rs.container.ContainerRequestContext;
026import jakarta.ws.rs.core.Form;
027import jakarta.ws.rs.core.MediaType;
028import jakarta.ws.rs.core.MultivaluedHashMap;
029import jakarta.ws.rs.core.MultivaluedMap;
030import jakarta.ws.rs.ext.Provider;
031import org.apache.logging.log4j.util.Strings;
032import org.glassfish.jersey.internal.util.collection.NullableMultivaluedHashMap;
033import org.glassfish.jersey.message.internal.AbstractFormProvider;
034
035import java.io.IOException;
036import java.io.InputStream;
037import java.io.OutputStream;
038import java.lang.annotation.Annotation;
039import java.lang.reflect.Type;
040
041@Produces({"application/x-www-form-urlencoded", "*/*"})
042@Consumes({"application/x-www-form-urlencoded"})
043@Singleton
044@Provider
045public final class ResourceObjectFormProvider extends AbstractFormProvider<ResourceObject> {
046
047    jakarta.inject.Provider<ContainerRequestContext> requestContextProvider;
048
049    @Inject
050    public ResourceObjectFormProvider(jakarta.inject.Provider<ContainerRequestContext> requestContextProvider)
051    {
052        this.requestContextProvider = requestContextProvider;
053    }
054
055    @Override
056    public boolean isReadable(Class<?> type, Type genericType, Annotation[] annotations, MediaType mediaType) {
057        return type == ResourceObject.class;
058    }
059
060    @Override
061    public ResourceObject readFrom(
062            Class<ResourceObject> type,
063            Type genericType,
064            Annotation annotations[],
065            MediaType mediaType,
066            MultivaluedMap<String, String> httpHeaders,
067            InputStream entityStream) throws IOException {
068
069        NullableMultivaluedHashMap<String, String> map = this.readFrom(new NullableMultivaluedHashMap<>(), mediaType, decode(annotations), entityStream);
070
071        String id = Strings.trimToNull(map.getFirst("id"));
072        return new ResourceObject.Builder(requestContextProvider.get().getUriInfo().getQueryParameters().getFirst("rel"), id).attributes(new Attributes.Builder().with(builder ->
073        {
074            map.forEach((name, value) ->
075            {
076                builder.attribute(name, value.get(0));
077            });
078        })).build();
079    }
080
081
082    private boolean decode(Annotation annotations[]) {
083        for (Annotation annotation : annotations) {
084            if (annotation.annotationType().equals(Encoded.class)) {
085                return false;
086            }
087        }
088        return true;
089    }
090
091    @Override
092    public boolean isWriteable(Class<?> type, Type genericType, Annotation[] annotations, MediaType mediaType) {
093        return type == Form.class;
094    }
095
096    @Override
097    public void writeTo(
098            ResourceObject ro,
099            Class<?> type,
100            Type genericType,
101            Annotation annotations[],
102            MediaType mediaType,
103            MultivaluedMap<String, Object> httpHeaders,
104            OutputStream entityStream) throws IOException {
105        writeTo(new MultivaluedHashMap<>(ro.getAttributes().toMap()), mediaType, entityStream);
106    }
107}
